code: import React from'react';import'./BookCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookCard=_ref=>{let{book,addToBookshelf}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[book.coverUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"book-cover",src:book.coverUrl,alt:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"book-card-h",children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"book-author",children:book.author_name?book.author_name.join(', '):'Unknown Author'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-book",onClick:()=>addToBookshelf(book),children:"Add to Bookshelf"})]})]});};export default BookCard;
